sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
    light: {
      colors: {
        globalBgColor: "white",
        btnTextColor: "white",
        btnBgColor: "#1976d2",
        btnBorderColor: "blue",
        hoverBtnColor: "white",
        hoverBtnBgColor: "#1565c0",
        containerBorderColor: "blue",
        containerBgColor: "transparent",
        counterColor: "blue",
        reverseBtnBorderColor: "blue",
        placeHolderText: "blue",
        mainText: "black",
      },
      id: 'light'
    },
  
    dark: {
      colors: {
        globalBgColor: "black",
        btnTextColor: "#FFF",
        btnBgColor: "purple",
        btnBorderColor: "#FFF",
        hoverBtnColor: "#FFF",
        hoverBtnBgColor: "#a657f2",
        containerBorderColor: "purple",
        containerBgColor: "transparent",
        counterColor: "#fff",
        reverseBtnBgColor: "#fff",
        reverseBtnBorderColor: "black",
        placeHolderText: "#fff",
        mainText: "purple",
      },
      id: 'dark'
    }
  };
